FuncDef: This command configures a TCA for the counter capturing drops due to the fragment-drop- all AQP command. A fragment-drop-all TCA can be created for traffic generated from the subscriber side of AA (from-sub) or for traffic generated from the network toward the AA subscriber (to-sub). Thecreatekeyword is mandatory when creating a fragment-drop-all TCA.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the traffic direction. Values-from-sub, to-sub.
Keyword used to create the TCA.
